zpow₀:
@[continuity]
theorem continuous.zpow₀ (hf : continuous f) (m : ℤ) (h0 : ∀ a, f a ≠ 0 ∨ 0 ≤ m) : continuous fun x => f x ^ m :=
  continuous_iff_continuous_at.2 fun x => (hf.tendsto x).zpow₀ m (h0 x)
#align continuous.zpow₀ continuous.zpow₀
tendsto_inv₀:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem tendsto_inv₀ {x : G₀} (hx : x ≠ 0) : tendsto has_inv.inv ((nhds) x) ((nhds) x⁻¹) :=
  continuous_at_inv₀ hx
#align tendsto_inv₀ tendsto_inv₀
mul_right₀_symm_apply:
@[simp]
theorem mul_right₀_symm_apply (c : α) (hc : c ≠ 0) : ((homeomorph.mul_right₀ c hc).symm : α → α) = fun x => x * c⁻¹ :=
  rfl
#align mul_right₀_symm_apply mul_right₀_symm_apply
mul_left₀_symm_apply:
@[simp]
theorem mul_left₀_symm_apply (c : α) (hc : c ≠ 0) : ((homeomorph.mul_left₀ c hc).symm : α → α) = (· * ·) c⁻¹ :=
  rfl
#align mul_left₀_symm_apply mul_left₀_symm_apply
inv₀:
theorem continuous_on.inv₀ (hf : continuous_on f s) (h0 : ∀ x ∈ s, f x ≠ 0) : continuous_on (fun x => (f x)⁻¹) s :=
  fun x hx => (hf x hx).inv₀ (h0 x hx)
#align continuous_on.inv₀ continuous_on.inv₀
div_const:
@[continuity]
theorem continuous.div_const (hf : continuous f) {y : G₀} : continuous fun x => f x / y := by
  simpa only [div_eq_mul_inv] using hf.mul continuous_const
#align continuous.div_const continuous.div_const
div:
@[continuity]
theorem continuous.div (hf : continuous f) (hg : continuous g) (h₀ : ∀ x, g x ≠ 0) : continuous (f / g) := by
  simpa only [div_eq_mul_inv] using hf.mul (hg.inv₀ h₀)
#align continuous.div continuous.div
continuous_on_zpow₀:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
theorem continuous_on_zpow₀ (m : ℤ) : continuous_on (fun x : G₀ => x ^ m) («expr ᶜ» {0}) := fun x hx =>
  (continuous_at_zpow₀ _ _ (or.inl hx)).continuous_within_at
#align continuous_on_zpow₀ continuous_on_zpow₀
continuous_on_inv₀:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
theorem continuous_on_inv₀ : continuous_on (has_inv.inv : G₀ → G₀) («expr ᶜ» {0}) := fun x hx =>
  (continuous_at_inv₀ hx).continuous_within_at
#align continuous_on_inv₀ continuous_on_inv₀
continuous_on_div:
theorem continuous_on_div : continuous_on (fun p : G₀ × G₀ => p.1 / p.2) { p | p.2 ≠ 0 } :=
  continuous_on_fst.div continuous_on_snd fun _ => id
#align continuous_on_div continuous_on_div
continuous_at_zpow₀:
theorem continuous_at_zpow₀ (x : G₀) (m : ℤ) (h : x ≠ 0 ∨ 0 ≤ m) : continuous_at (fun x => x ^ m) x :=
  by
  cases m
  · simpa only [zpow_ofNat] using continuous_at_pow x m
  · simp only [zpow_negSucc]
    have hx : x ≠ 0 := h.resolve_right (int.neg_succ_of_nat_lt_zero m).not_le
    exact (continuous_at_pow x (m + 1)).inv₀ (pow_ne_zero _ hx)
#align continuous_at_zpow₀ continuous_at_zpow₀
comp_div_cases:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `uncurry -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `uncurry -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `filter.prod -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/-- `h x (f x / g x)` is continuous under certain conditions, even if the denominator is sometimes
  `0`. See docstring of `continuous_at.comp_div_cases`. -/
theorem continuous.comp_div_cases {f g : α → G₀} (h : α → G₀ → β) (hf : continuous f) (hg : continuous g)
    (hh : ∀ a, g a ≠ 0 → continuous_at (uncurry h) (a, f a / g a))
    (h2h : ∀ a, g a = 0 → tendsto (uncurry h) (filter.prod ((nhds) a) («expr⊤»)) ((nhds) (h a 0))) :
    continuous fun x => h x (f x / g x) :=
  continuous_iff_continuous_at.mpr fun a => hf.continuous_at.comp_div_cases _ hg.continuous_at (hh a) (h2h a)
#align continuous.comp_div_cases continuous.comp_div_cases
coe_mul_right₀:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⇑ » -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_mul_right₀ (c : α) (hc : c ≠ 0) : «expr⇑ » (homeomorph.mul_right₀ c hc) = fun x => x * c :=
  rfl
#align coe_mul_right₀ coe_mul_right₀
coe_mul_left₀:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⇑ » -/
@[simp]
theorem coe_mul_left₀ (c : α) (hc : c ≠ 0) : «expr⇑ » (homeomorph.mul_left₀ c hc) = (· * ·) c :=
  rfl
#align coe_mul_left₀ coe_mul_left₀
